segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to lose his balance any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel worried for him, hoping he doesn't take a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable and wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman isn't paying attention to what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn't even seem to notice or care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being smart by staying on the floor and not putting herself in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's still involved but not taking the same risks as the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is making me feel a bit on edge, like I want to step in and help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay in the end and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
